Istorijski trenutak za Zvezdu, Terzić ponosan: Dokaz da pripadamo evropskim velikanima
04 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Zile
Generalni direktor Crvene zvezde, Zvezdan Terzić, predstavio je danas novi istorijski trenutak koji prema njegovim rečima predstavlja dragulj u kruni klupskih uspeha.
Zvanično je i svečano otvorena Zvezda TV, čiji će program početi u utorak 5. novembra od 12 časova na platformi Telekoma Srbije. Redni broj kanala biće 320, dok će u HD rezoluciji biti na broju 720.
– Ispunjen ponosom stojim pred vama, jer otvaramo Zvezdinu televiziju. Još jedan dragulj u kruni naših uspeha. Projekat Zvezda TV je dokaz da Crvena zvezda pripada evropskim velikanima. Svojom istorijom, sadašnjošću i planovima za budućnost. Ne tako davno, pre pet godina, stajao sam na ovom mestu, samo sprat iznad, kada smo promovisali novog trenera u mraku, jer na našem stadionu nije bilo struje. Tada sam Vam rekao da samo tražim vreme, ono je brzo proticalo, a mi smo radili marljivo, ulagali energiju, znanje i emocije. Imali smo viziju, rekao je Terzić.
– Danas, Crvena zvezda dominira u domaćem prvenstvu, svi se nadamo trećoj tituli zaredom, tri godine igramo u Evropi, drugu godinu u nizu je to Liga šampiona. Danas, Marakana sija nekim novim sjajem, a dočekali smo i da otvorimo Zvezda TV. Uložili smo mnogo i veoma smo ponosni. Od sutra naši navijači u Srbiji, Republici Srpskoj, Crnoj Gori, čitavoj Evropi i svetu, moći će jednim klikom dugmeta da budu prisutni. U saradnji sa našim sponzorom, kompanijom Telekom, napravili smo iskorak u budućnost. Okupili smo ekipu mladih ljudi, koji ima energiju i znanje, da svim navijačima Crvene zvezde na pravi način dočaraju ono što se dešava u našem klubu, kao i ono što će se tek dešavati. Nadamo se novim pobedama i titulama, dodao je Terzić.
Direktor Zvezda TV biće Siniša Božović.
– Došao sam na Marakanu pre 40 godina, bila je to subota. Rekoše mi da dođem u utorak, ponesem dve slike i krštenicu. Od tada je Zvezda emocija. Na svakoj utakmici koju sam posmatrao na ovom stadionu, gledao sam ljude oko sebe i tražio emociju. To je naš zadatak, pokušaćemo da Zvezdašima na male ekrane donesemo emociju. Okupili smo sjajnu ekipu, veoma dobar tim koji je kadar da iznese upravo ono što nam je osnovni zadatak. Da informišemo, da zabavimo i da pogodimo emociju kod svih onih koji Zvezdu nose u srcu ili kod svih onih koji bi to trebali da počnu da čine, izjavio je Božović.
Otvaranje crveno-bele televizije podržali su aktuelni prvotimci zajedno sa stručnim štabom, kao i legende kluba poput Dragana Džajića, Duleta Savića, Miloša Šestića, Kuleta Aćimovića i mnogih drugih.

text:
Historical moment for Zvezda, Terzic proud: Proof that we belong to the European greats
04 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Zile
The Red Star's general manager, Zvezdan Terzic, presented a new historic moment today, which he said is a jewel in the crown of club success.
Zvezda TV is officially inaugurated, whose program will begin on Tuesday, November 5th from 12 noon on Telekom Srbija's platform. The channel number will be 320, while in HD resolution it will be 720.
- Filled with pride, I stand before you as we open Star TV. Another jewel in the crown of our successes. The Star TV project is proof that Red Star belongs to the European greats. With its history, present and plans for the future. Not too long ago, five years ago, I was standing in this place, just a floor above, when we were promoting a new coach in the dark because there was no electricity in our stadium. Then I told you I was just looking for time, it was fast-paced, and we worked diligently, investing energy, knowledge and emotions. We had a vision, Terzic said.
- Today, Red Star dominates the national championship, we all hope for the third title in a row, we play in Europe for three years, for the second year in a row it is the Champions League. Today, Marakana is shining with some new splendor, and we have also been welcomed to open Star TV. We have invested a lot and are very proud. From tomorrow, our fans in Serbia, Republika Srpska, Montenegro, the whole of Europe and the world will be able to be present at the click of a button. In cooperation with our sponsor, Telekom, we have made a step forward. We have brought together a team of young people, who have the energy and knowledge, to give all Red Star fans the right way to hear what's going on in our club as well as what's going to happen. We hope for new victories and titles, Terzic added.
The director of Zvezda TV will be Sinisa Bozovic.
- I came to Marakan 40 years ago, it was a Saturday. They told me to come on Tuesday, bring two pictures and a christening card. She has been an Emotional Star ever since. At every game I watched in this stadium, I looked at the people around me and looked for emotion. That is our task, we will try to bring emotion to the Stars on the small screens. We have assembled a great team, a very good team that is able to put forward exactly what our core mission is. "To inform, entertain and hit the emotion of all those who carry the Star in their hearts, or all those who should start doing it," said Bozovic.
The opening of the red-and-white television was supported by the current prime-movers along with professional staff, as well as club legends such as Dragan Dzajic, Dulet Savic, Milos Sestic, Kulet Acimovic and many others.
